name: table gathering
content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<queryservice xmlns="http://www.anyframejava.org/schema/query/mapping" 
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.anyframejava.org/schema/query/mapping http://www.anyframejava.org/schema/query/anyframe-query-mapping-1.0.xsd ">
    <queries>
		<query id="InterfaceAlmDao.getListProject" isDynamic="true">
			<statement>
			<![CDATA[	
/* 솔루션정보(솔루션코드,솔루션명,사업부코드,사업부명)  */
select pjt_code, pjt_name, pm_name, pjt_desc, pjt_key
     , start_dt, end_dt, create_dttm, create_id, update_dttm, update_id
     , business_unit_code
     , (select text
          from co_lang_message m, co_detail_code_master d
         where m.pjt_code = d.pjt_code
           and d.code_id = 'BUSINESS_UNIT_CODE'
           and m.key_id = d.detail_code_name
           and m.lang_code = 'ko_KR'
           and d.detail_code_id = co_project_master.business_unit_code) as business_unit_name
  from co_project_master 
 where use_yn='Y' 
   and pjt_code <> 'TEMPLATE' 
#if($pjtCode && !$pjtCode.equals(""))
   AND PJT_CODE = :pjtCode
#end  
			]]>
			</statement>
			<result class="com.sds.qanalysis.inteface.alm.domain.IfProjectVo" />	
		</query>

		<query id="InterfaceAlmDao.getListReleaseVersion" isDynamic="true">
			<statement>
			<![CDATA[	
/* 솔루션 릴리즈 버전정보 */
SELECT SRV.PJT_CODE, SRV.VERSION_ID, SRV.VERSION, SRV.STATUS_CODE, SRV.DESCRIPTION
     , SRV.START_DATE, SRV.RELEASE_DATE, SRV.EXP_RELEASE_DATE, LAST_SPRINT.EXP_SPRINT_END_DATE
     , LAST_SPRINT.FIRST_SPRINT_START_DATE, LAST_SPRINT.LAST_SPRINT_END_DATE
     , REMAINED_STORYPOINT.REMAINED_STORYPOINT
  FROM SCOUT_RELEASE_VERSION SRV
     , CO_PROJECT_MASTER CPM
     , (SELECT A.VERSION_ID, EXP_SPRINT_END_DATE, FIRST_SPRINT_START_DATE, LAST_SPRINT_END_DATE
          FROM (SELECT VERSION_ID, MAX(EXP_END_DATE) AS EXP_SPRINT_END_DATE
                  FROM SCOUT_SPRINT 
                 WHERE EXCEPT_PROGRESS_MANAGEMENT = 'N'
              GROUP BY VERSION_ID
               ) A
             , (SELECT VERSION_ID, MIN(START_DATE) AS FIRST_SPRINT_START_DATE
                     , MAX(END_DATE) AS LAST_SPRINT_END_DATE
                  FROM SCOUT_SPRINT 
                 WHERE START_DATE IS NOT NULL
                   AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL
                   AND EXCEPT_PROGRESS_MANAGEMENT = 'N'
              GROUP BY VERSION_ID
               ) B
         WHERE A.VERSION_ID = B.VERSION_ID (+)
       ) LAST_SPRINT
     , (SELECT SW.PJT_CODE, SS.VERSION_ID, SUM(SWCV.NUMBER_VALUE) AS REMAINED_STORYPOINT
          FROM (SELECT SS.SPRINT_ID, SRV.VERSION_ID
                     , SS.SPRINT_NAME 
                     , SRV.STATUS_CODE AS VERSION_STATUS_CODE
                     , SS.STATUS_CODE AS STATUS_CODE
                  FROM SCOUT_SPRINT SS, SCOUT_RELEASE_VERSION SRV 
                 WHERE SS.STATUS_CODE <> '3'
                   AND SS.VERSION_ID = SRV.VERSION_ID
                   AND SRV.EXCEPT_PROGRESS_MANAGEMENT = 'N'
                   AND SS.EXCEPT_PROGRESS_MANAGEMENT = 'N') SS
                     , SCOUT_WORKITEM SW 
                     , SCOUT_WORKITEM_CUSTOM_VALUE SWCV
         WHERE SS.SPRINT_ID = SW.SPRINT_ID
           AND SW.WORKITEM_ID = SWCV.WORKITEM_ID 
           AND SW
author: verystrongjoe
